trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows status bar control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 状态栏控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> replaces the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> 替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Special features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> include a custom table layout, support for the form's sizing and moving grips, and support for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A> property, which allows a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> to fill available space automatically.
trans-unit.target: 特殊功能的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>包括自定义表布局、 支持窗体的大小调整和移动手柄，以及对支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A>属性，它允许<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>以自动填充可用空间。

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: 以下各项专门用于与都无缝配合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>中所有的方向。

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control:
trans-unit.target: 会在设计时按默认提供的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控件：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control displays information about an object being viewed on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the object's components, or contextual information that relates to that object's operation within your application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> 控件将显示有关在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> 上查看的对象、对象组件的信息或应用程序内与该对象操作相关的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control consists of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> objects, each of which displays text, an icon, or both.
trans-unit.target: 通常，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> 控件由 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> 对象组成，每个对象将显示文本、图标或两者都有。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> can also contain <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> 也可以包括 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> has no panels.
trans-unit.target: 默认 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> 没有面板。

trans-unit.source: To add panels to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, or use the [StatusStrip Items Collection Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c56677b-d5eb-4eca-949c-a22c4e3833a1) at design time to add, remove, or reorder items and modify properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要将面板添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法或使用[StatusStrip 项集合编辑器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c56677b-d5eb-4eca-949c-a22c4e3833a1)在设计时添加、 删除或重新排序的项和修改属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the [StatusStrip Tasks Dialog Box](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c150678b-4873-4743-b23f-84fb3126582c) at design time to run common commands.
trans-unit.target: 使用[StatusStrip 任务对话框](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c150678b-4873-4743-b23f-84fb3126582c)在设计时运行常用命令。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> replaces and extends the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> 替换并扩展了早期版本的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> 控件，但也可以选择保留 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> 以备向后兼容性和将来使用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>的各种常见属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> supports overflow functionality.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 是否支持溢出功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> supports overflow functionality; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 支持溢出功能，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: 为该控件创建一个新的辅助功能对象。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果不显式调用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> 方法，则在引用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性时将会调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`随.NET Framework 一起安装的程序集。

trans-unit.source: For a code example demonstrating how to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The text to use for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: 要用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> 的文本。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>text</c> parameter is a hyphen (-), this method creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>text</c> 参数是连字符 (-)，此方法将创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> 上显示的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> 时引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> 事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Creates a default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> with the specified text, image, and event handler on a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 在新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 实例上使用指定文本、图像和事件处理程序创建默认 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.#ctor(System.String,System.Drawing.Image,System.EventHandler)" />, or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" /> if the <paramref name="text" /> parameter is a hyphen (-).
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.#ctor(System.String,System.Drawing.Image,System.EventHandler)" />，或者如果 <paramref name="text" /> 参数为连字符 (-)，则为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CreateDefaultItem%2A> method to add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> with commonly used characteristics to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CreateDefaultItem%2A>方法将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>通常使用到特征<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>。

trans-unit.source: Gets which borders of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> are docked to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 的哪些边框停靠在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 上。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Bottom" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Bottom" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the spacing, in pixels, between the left, right, top, and bottom edges of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> from the edges of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 的左边缘、右边缘、上边缘、下边缘与窗体的左边缘、右边缘、上边缘、下边缘之间的间距（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the spacing.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示间隔的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>{Left=6, Top=2, Right=0, Bottom=2}</c>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.DefaultPadding%2A> property to set the interior space between controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.DefaultPadding%2A>属性来设置控件之间的内部空间。

trans-unit.source: When a control is a container of items, padding represents the space from the edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: 项的容器控件时，填充从容器的边缘表示空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> by default.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示是否为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 默认显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in pixels, of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> when it is first created.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 在第一次创建时以像素为单位的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Point.#ctor(System.Drawing.Size)" /> constructor representing the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Point.#ctor(System.Drawing.Size)" /> 的大小（以像素为单位）的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 构造函数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>引用。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要停靠在其父控件上的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 边框，并确定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 如何随其父控件一起调整大小。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Bottom" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Bottom" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Dock%2A> property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Dock%2A>属性来定义如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>调整其父控件的大小时是否自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: For example, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Dock%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 例如，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Dock%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left>导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>将其自身对齐其父控件的左边缘和根据父控件一起调整大小调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth).
trans-unit.target: 控件停靠在其 Z 顺序，即沿窗体的 z 轴 （深度） 窗体上控件的可视化分层。

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以停靠到其父容器的一个边或可以停靠到所有边缘和填充的父容器。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Dock%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>的各种常见属性设置，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Dock%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visibility of the grip used to reposition the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用作重新定位控件的手柄的可见性。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Hidden" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Hidden" />。

trans-unit.source: Even with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> property set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A> property set to `Visible`, the sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property to one of the overflow values.
trans-unit.target: 即使使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A>属性设置为`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A>属性设置为`Visible`，除非您还将设置不会显示大小调整手柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>属性为溢出值之一。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>, the sizing grip will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>，大小调整手柄将不会显示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>的各种常见属性设置，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> lays out the items collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 如何对项集合进行布局。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property to get or set how items are arranged on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>属性来获取或设置项上的排列方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>的各种常见属性设置，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains information about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />，它包含有关要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 的信息。

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 绘制控件的背景。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnPaintBackground%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnPaintBackground%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Provides custom table layout for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 提供自定义表布局。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnSpringTableLayoutCore%2A> to do custom table layouts.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnSpringTableLayoutCore%2A>进行自定义表布局。

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> 的默认值为 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Resets the collection of displayed and overflow items after a layout is done.
trans-unit.target: 在完成布局后，重置显示的项和溢出项的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if ToolTips are shown for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 的工具提示，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A> property to get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> display behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A>属性来获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>显示行为。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>的各种常见属性设置，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the boundaries of the sizing handle (grip) for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 的大小调整手柄的边界。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the grip boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 表示手柄边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a sizing handle (grip) is displayed in the lower-right corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在控件的右下角显示大小调整手柄。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a grip is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示手柄，则值为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> property to display a grip to provide an indication to the user of when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> is resizable.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A>属性显示到时的用户提供指示调整手柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>可进行调整。

trans-unit.source: Even with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> property set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A> property set to `Visible`, the sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property to one of the overflow values.
trans-unit.target: 即使使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A>属性设置为`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A>属性设置为`Visible`，除非您还将设置不会显示大小调整手柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>属性为溢出值之一。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>, the sizing grip will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>，大小调整手柄将不会显示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>的各种常见属性设置，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> stretches from end to end in its container.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 是否在它的容器中从一端拉伸到另一端。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> stretches from end to end in its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 在其 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> 中从一端拉伸到另一端，则为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Stretch%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>的各种常见属性设置，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Stretch%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 处理 Windows 消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure wraps messages that Windows sends.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>结构包装 Windows 将发送的消息。

trans-unit.source: You can use this structure to wrap a message and assign it to the window procedure to be dispatched.
trans-unit.target: 此结构可用于包装消息，并将其分配给窗口过程，以进行调度。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this structure to get information about a message the system sends to your application or controls.
trans-unit.target: 此结构还可用于获取有关消息系统发送到你的应用程序或控件的信息。

trans-unit.source: You cannot create the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure directly.
trans-unit.target: 无法创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>直接结构。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Create%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>结构，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Create%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To make creating <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structures more efficient, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure uses its pool of existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structures instead of creating an instance of a new one, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 以方便创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>结构更高效，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>结构使用自己的现有池<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>结构而不是如有可能创建一个新的实例。

trans-unit.source: However, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure is not available in the pool, a new instance of the structure is created.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>结构在池中不可用，请创建结构的新实例。
